pages.text: A few quality of life things that can be nice to get while you're on the Lunar Plane.

A $(item)Garden Cloche$() can grow crops when given some $(item)Power$() and a steady supply of $(item)Water$().$(br2)Search for $(item)Cloche$() in $(item)JEI$() to see available $(item)Fertilizers$() and their potency.
Waystones let you travel around the world in a speedy manner.$(br2)You can travel to them using a $(item)Warp Stone$() or by activating another $(item)Waystone$().
A $(item)Warp Stone$() will allow you to travel to previously placed $(item)Waystones$() around the world.$(br2)There is a 30 second cooldown period after using the stone.
A source of $(item)Infinite Water$().$(br)Will be very helpful later on.

pages.title: Better Backpacks
pages.text: Later on in this $(item)Simulation$() you can craft a bigger backpack, this bag holds an impressive amount of items.$(br2)It can also hold a greater number of $(item)Upgrades$().
If you're willing to go the extra mile in this simulation you can get a $(item)Quarry card$().$(br2)This will allow you to $(item)GREATLY$() improve your $(item)Resource Gathering Capabilities$().
